name: War Of Freedom
description:
The story and the people in this game are completely fictional. Nidamenia is an island country occupied by the Angomenia empire. Elena lost her village and family during the occupation. She will do her best for the revenge of her family and the independence of her country. In this adventure, Elena will meet new people and struggle to gain strength and achieve her goals together.

You can interact with some people and get information and tasks in this game played with TPP camera angle. You can earn gold by collecting animal skins by hunting and selling the collected skins to the innkeeper. With the gold earned, you can make our character stronger by improving the abilities of our characters. In this open-world game, you can do tasks and hunt or explore around whenever you want. You can use bow, sword and ax to fight enemies. You can improve your weapons and fight stronger with enemies.
